item.title: About Me
item.author: nixorg@gmail.com (Yauheni Kuzmianok)
item.description: Hello name is Yauheni Kuzmianok. I’m software developer with about 6 year of exprience. My interrests: Programming Emacs Efficency and productivity Functional programming Projects fly keys - IntelliJ Idea plugin for modal editing Work Amway Role: Developer Customer: Amway Period: July 2018 till now Technology: Kotlin, Java, Spring, Hybris, Servlets/JSP, JSTL, jQuery, AJAX, JavaScript, JSON, HTML, CSS Traveler Distributed platform Role: Development Team Lead Customer: Datalex, inc Period: Feb 2012 - May 2013 and July 2014 - July 2018 Technology: Java, Struts, Tiles, Servlets/JSP, JSTL, jQuery, AJAX, JavaScript, JSON, HTML, CSS, Velocity Templates, Closure Templates
